title: Overwatch is BACK!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.27.22
description:
Blessing and Janet talk about Overwatch 2's beta success, Twitch's possible revenue switch ups, and Nintendo Switch Sports reviews.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:40 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now. It’s my review-in-progress of Nintendo Switch Sports along with Andy and mine’s impressions of the Overwatch 2 beta. You can catch that right now on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report  -

00:07:03 - Is Overwatch BACK?
00:22:17 - Nintendo Switch Sports Review Round Up
00:34:46 - Ads
00:37:55 - Nearly 60 games are reportedly leaving PS Now before the new PS Plus replaces it
00:47:53 - Twitch is revamping Creator Pay
00:55:20 - A new Disney life sim adventure game has been announced
01:01:20 - Out today
01:04:19 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Bless
